column1: # These readings cover two or three not-well-identified locations as the gauge moved around in Horncastle.
# The initial location seems likely to be at Stanhope Villas, where the observer Mr H.R. Maynard lived.
# The grid reference of Stanhope Villas is provided.
# A move is recorded on the 1930s sheet at the end of July 1931.
# The gauge moved to the Langton Hill site at the end of April 1937.
